entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 01:41 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure: 103.2 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: NNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning. Rain showers beginning in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
